title: How to Defeat Manhandla in the Legend of Zelda

methods.name: Defeating Manhandla in the Legend of Zelda

steps.headline: Get to the Boss Room.
steps.description: Manhandla can be found on Level 3 of the Third Dungeon. After getting the key to the room, head to the third floor to get inside Manhandla’s boss room.

steps.headline: Avoid its attacks.
steps.description: Once you enter the room, Manhandla will quickly start chasing after you and biting you with one of its four heads. Avoid the attacks by constantly moving around the room and anticipating where the monster will go to next.

steps.headline: Take out the four heads.
steps.description: Slowly approach Manhandla and attack one of its four heads until it’s completely destroyed. Keep attacking Manhandla until all of its four heads are completely destroyed. Manhandla will be defeated once all its heads are destroyed.

steps.headline: Take out the four heads using bombs.
steps.description: Aside from your swords, Manhandla’s heads will also take damage from bombs. Simply throw bombs at the monster and it will damage the heads once it explodes. This method is less efficient than using your sword because you’ll need a hefty amount of bombs for you to destroy the monster.

steps.headline: Find Manhandla.
steps.description: The monster can be found in the Valley of Seers and in Gerudo Desert. Manhandla can be found sitting in the middle section of the area and will start attacking you once you come closer.

steps.headline: Avoid its attacks.
steps.description: Manhandla will attack you with its four heads, biting and gnawing at you. Simply dodge these attacks by jumping out of the way of its heads. During the battle, seeds will also be falling from the sky, which can damage your character. These seeds will only stop falling once you kill Manhandla. Just keep moving around to dodge the falling seeds. On the other hand, it would be best to just ignore these attacks and focus on killing the monster as quick as possible.

steps.headline: Attack the heads with your boomerang.
steps.description: Take out your boomerang and aim at one of Manhandla’s heads. The heads will turn green and retreat back into its body if you hit it. Keep attacking Manhandla until all of its four heads retracts inside the body.

steps.headline: Attack its body.
steps.description: Once all four heads have retracted to its body, attack its body with your sword. After two to three strikes, all of its four heads will come out and resume its attack on you again.

steps.headline: Continue attacking the heads and body.
steps.description: Manhandla can only be killed by attacking its body. Repeat attacking the head until they retreat, and then attacking the body a few times until Manhandla is defeated.

text: Defeating Manhandla in the Legend of Zelda Get to the Boss Room. Manhandla can be found on Level 3 of the Third Dungeon. After getting the key to the room, head to the third floor to get inside Manhandla’s boss room. Avoid its attacks. Once you enter the room, Manhandla will quickly start chasing after you and biting you with one of its four heads. Avoid the attacks by constantly moving around the room and anticipating where the monster will go to next. Take out the four heads. Slowly approach Manhandla and attack one of its four heads until it’s completely destroyed. Keep attacking Manhandla until all of its four heads are completely destroyed. Manhandla will be defeated once all its heads are destroyed. Take out the four heads using bombs. Aside from your swords, Manhandla’s heads will also take damage from bombs. Simply throw bombs at the monster and it will damage the heads once it explodes. This method is less efficient than using your sword because you’ll need a hefty amount of bombs for you to destroy the monster. Defeating Manhandla in Hyrule Warriors Find Manhandla. The monster can be found in the Valley of Seers and in Gerudo Desert. Manhandla can be found sitting in the middle section of the area and will start attacking you once you come closer. Avoid its attacks. Manhandla will attack you with its four heads, biting and gnawing at you. Simply dodge these attacks by jumping out of the way of its heads. During the battle, seeds will also be falling from the sky, which can damage your character. These seeds will only stop falling once you kill Manhandla. Just keep moving around to dodge the falling seeds. On the other hand, it would be best to just ignore these attacks and focus on killing the monster as quick as possible. Attack the heads with your boomerang. Take out your boomerang and aim at one of Manhandla’s heads. The heads will turn green and retreat back into its body if you hit it. Keep attacking Manhandla until all of its four heads retracts inside the body. Attack its body. Once all four heads have retracted to its body, attack its body with your sword. After two to three strikes, all of its four heads will come out and resume its attack on you again. Continue attacking the heads and body. Manhandla can only be killed by attacking its body. Repeat attacking the head until they retreat, and then attacking the body a few times until Manhandla is defeated.
